p: In detail, samples were thawed and seeded at 10 5 cells/well in 96-well plates in StemSpan (STEMCELL Technologies) supplemented with interleukin (IL)-3 and IL-6 (both at 20 ng/ml; Peprotech), flt3 ligand (FLT3LG) and stem cell factor (SCF) (both at 100 ng/ml; Peprotech) to allow cell proliferation. The ATMP-CD133 growing capacity was assessed using the cumulative population doubling levels (CPDL), as previously described [ 23].
